channel.title: Drug World United - [1.3.1] [Griefing, Raiding, Drugs, Fun]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://brandymadison.com/MC/forum2.png[/img][/center] [center][b]Server Address:[/b] 50.79.124.30:25550[/center]
[center][b]WHAT IS DRUG WORLD UNITED?[/b][/center] Drug World United or DWU is a fun hardcore drug server. PvP and Grefing is allowed. We have a main city called Newb City. The city contains a Rehab Center, an Armor Shop, Mob Arena, and many more shops and houses. To make it equalually fair, there is a 5,000 block border from the Holy Church. There are many areas to explore and we recommend that you do as it will help you in the long run. [center][b]WANT MORE INFO?[/b][/center] www.bit.ly/DrugPost OR http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/1415389-drug-world-united-131-griefing-raiding-drugs-fun/#entry17210527

item.description:
@Waterspice wrote:

[center][/center]
[center]Server Address: 50.79.124.30:25550[/center]

[center]WHAT IS DRUG WORLD UNITED?[/center]
Drug World United or DWU is a fun hardcore drug server. PvP and Grefing is allowed. We have a main city called Newb City. The city contains a Rehab Center, an Armor Shop, Mob Arena, and many more shops and houses. To make it equalually fair, there is a 5,000 block border from the Holy Church. There are many areas to explore and we recommend that you do as it will help you in the long run.
[center]WANT MORE INFO?[/center]
